thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-American River Bankshares Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.06

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-American River Bankshares Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.06
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - American River Bankshares:
* REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.19 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.19 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* ‍NET INTEREST INCOME DURING Q4 2017 DECREASED 4.7% TO $4.9 MILLION​
* ‍ NET INTEREST INCOME DURING Q4 2017 DECREASED 4.7% TO $4.9 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
